title: Fan, 1775–85
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robertson D. Ward, from the collection of her mother, Mrs. Helen Wright-Clark Dawson
description: Pleated fan. Front leaf of painted silk with tambour work and metallic spangles, back leaf of painted silk; sticks of carved and pierced ivory, mother-of-pearl backing behind the guards; glass stone at the rivet. The portraits and the oval monograms on either side of the leaf are probably those of the bride and groom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, 1775–85.
1775–85. Medium: painted silk. Gift of Mrs. Robertson D. Ward, from the collection of her mother, Mrs. Helen Wright-Clark Dawson. 1970-58-9.
